plot: A single dad believes he's on a mission from God to save pit bulls. A woman tries to stop her stubborn mother's cat hoarding before she ends up homeless.
title: "Confessions: Animal Hoarding" Too Many Pitbulls
plot_es: A single dad believes he's on a mission from God to save pit bulls. A woman tries to stop her stubborn mother's cat hoarding before she ends up homeless.
plot_en: A single dad believes he's on a mission from God to save pit bulls. A woman tries to stop her stubborn mother's cat hoarding before she ends up homeless.
